dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: communityType
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores the information responsible for the relationship between a plot observation and a community type.
entity.entityDescription: There are still some major issues with this entity. Primarily, the decision about where to store the updated 'link' between plots and community types has not yet been made.

attribute.attNotes: The Primary key of the communityType table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a unique community type applied to a single plot observation.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the plotObservation table.
attribute.attDefinition: This key provides a link between comminity type(s) with a specific plot observation.
This is the class_association from the National Vegetaion Classification Standard.

attribute.attNotes: This is a very subjective attribute, and may be removed later.
attribute.attDefinition: This is the quality of the classification assignment.
Start date for the classification assignment of the plot observation.

attribute.attNotes: Stop date for the classification assignment of the plot observation.
